Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Prelude of Light#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Kid# grants #the Prescription#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #a Small Key#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that scoring 1500 in #horseback archery# grants #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #Bombs (5 pieces)#.
